quote: Never miss a good chance to shut up.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Don't speak unless you can improve on the silence.
author: Danish proverb

quote: Silence is golden when you can't think of a good answer.
author: Muhammed Ali

quote: The only successful substitute for brains is silence.
A man's silence is wonderful to listen to.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: Silence more musical than any song.
author: Christina Rossetti

quote: My personal hobbies are reading, listening to music, and silence.
author: Edith Sitwell

quote: speech is silver; silence is golden'
author: Proverb

quote: Nothing is more useful than silence.
Ask me about my vow of silence.
There are grammatical errors even in his silence.
author: grammar nazi

quote: Some people talk because they think sound is more manageable than silence.
author: Margaret Halsey

quote: Silence is the ultimate weapon of power.
author: Charles De Gaulle

quote: Silences make the real conversations between friends. Not the saying but the never needing to say is what counts.
author: Margaret Lee Runbeck
